name: NSBrowserCell
desc: The user interface of a browser.

items.name: class var branchImage: NSImage?
items.desc: Returns the default image for branch cells in a browser.

items.name: class var highlightedBranchImage: NSImage?
items.desc: Returns the default image for branch browser cells that are highlighted.

items.name: var alternateImage: NSImage?
items.desc: The browser cell’s image for the highlighted state.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Unhighlights the receiver and unsets its state.

items.name: func set()
items.desc: Highlights the receiver and sets its state.

items.name: var isLeaf: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the browser cell is a leaf or a branch cell.

items.name: var isLoaded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the cell is ready to display.

items.name: func highlightColor(in: NSView) -> NSColor?
items.desc: Returns the highlight color that the receiver wants to display.
